page.pageDescription: You'll be mesmarized by Marian Zburlea's resume

content.title: Marian Zburlea
text: I translate geek into English and I’m a problem solver driven by challenge. Work is my passion and I focus on innovation and design for the future.

content.title: Awards
text: 2014, BEST 30S ELEVATOR SPEED SPEECH Google Plex meeting – London, UK
2001, BEST WEB SITE FOR PRESIDENT ELECTIONS - Constanta / Romania

content.title: Achievement
text: Build custom SEO CMS that boosted search results position in Google's first places for tens of clients and their websites.

author.name: Marian Zburlea
author.title: Web Developer
author.//: There is no way to create comments in a JSON file and this is close enough
The 'social' property value is an array of objects,
a collection of objects, and each object has two properties,
an icon and an url. The collection and Those properties
will be used to generate the social media link bar.
